import { useState } from 'react' import LoginForm from '../components/LoginForm' import { login, register } from '../services/Api' import RegisterForm from '../components/RegisterForm' function Auth () { const [isResgister, setResgister] = useState(false) const handleSubmit = async (credentials) => { isResgister ? login(credentials) : register(credentials) } const handleRegisterChange = (event) => { event.preventDefault() setResgister(!isResgister) } return ( <>

AUTHENTIFICATION

{ isResgister ? : }
{ isResgister ? "J'ai déjà un compte" : "Je n'ai pas de compte" }

Inscription





) } export default Auth
